argument.name: Record_Count
argument.description: The number of records in the browse's current query list.

page.description: Returns the number of records in a form's current query list.
page.discussion: The <BROWSE>.RECORDS_GET() method returns the number of records in a browses's current query list. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim ptr as P ptr = browse.view("CustomerBrowse") ? ptr.Records_Get() = 60.000000
